item.title: Verifying TraTs
item.description: This guide details the steps to verify Transaction Tokens (TraTs) after successfully generating them as per the Generating TraTs guide. Overview Accessing Tratteria’s Public Key JSON Web Key Sets (JWKS) Verifing TraTs Overview TraTs are cryptographically signed by Tratteria’s private key and are verifiable using Tratteria’s public key. Accessing Tratteria’s Public Key JSON Web Key Sets (JWKS) Tratteria’s signing key can be generated seperately and supplied through the configuration, or if not provided, it is automatically generated by Tratteria.
